mapper.select: SELECT CH_NO, M_ID, M_NICKNAME FROM RELATION JOIN CHANNEL ON (CH_NO = R_CH_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (M_UNO = CH_NO) WHERE R_TYPE = 'SUBSCRIBE' AND R_TARGET_UNO = #{value}

SELECT CH_NO, M_NICKNAME, B_NO, B_TITLE, B_WRITE_DATE, AT_NO, AT_MODIFY_NAME FROM RELATION JOIN MEMBER ON (M_UNO = R_CH_NO) JOIN CHANNEL ON (CH_NO = R_CH_NO) JOIN BOARD ON (B_CH_NO = R_CH_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (AT_B_NO = B_NO) WHERE R_TYPE='SUBSCRIBE' AND R_TARGET_UNO = #{value} AND AT_TYPE = 'VOD' ORDER BY B_WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT CH_NO, M_NICKNAME, BT_NO, BT_TITLE, BT_START_TIME FROM RELATION JOIN MEMBER ON (M_UNO = R_CH_NO) JOIN CHANNEL ON (CH_NO = R_CH_NO) JOIN BROADCAST ON (BT_CH_NO = R_CH_NO) WHERE R_TYPE = 'SUBSCRIBE' AND R_TARGET_UNO = #{value} AND M_BT_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BT_START_TIME DESC
